HERO.TITLE: Swipe - Trusted & Professional Cleaning Services
HERO.DESCRIPTION: At Swipe, we deliver high-quality, tailored cleaning services for homes and businesses. Join thousands of satisfied clients who trust us to create cleaner, healthier environments.

USE_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: Getting started is easy! Follow these simple steps to benefit from our services.
USE_SERVICES.STEP1_DESC: Create an account to access our services.
USE_SERVICES.STEP2_DESC: Choose from a variety of our cleaning options.
USE_SERVICES.STEP3_DESC: Select a time that suits you.
USE_SERVICES.CLEANER_STEP2_DESC: Select the type of service you want to offer as a cleaner.
USE_SERVICES.CLEANER_STEP3_DESC: You’ll be notified when clients request your services.

SERVICES.TITLE: Explore Our Comprehensive Cleaning Services
SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: We offer a variety of cleaning services tailored to meet your needs. From residential to commercial spaces, we ensure a spotless environment.

OFFICE_CLEANING.TITLE: Professional Office Cleaning for a Productive Space
OFFICE_CLEANING.DESCRIPTION: Keep your workplace spotless and inviting with our expert office cleaning services.

GARDEN_CLEANING.TITLE: Garden Cleaning to Enhance Your Outdoor Space
GARDEN_CLEANING.DESCRIPTION: Our garden cleaning services will rejuvenate your outdoor areas, making them beautiful and enjoyable.

HOME_CLEANING.TITLE: Home Cleaning Services You Can Trust
HOME_CLEANING.DESCRIPTION: Our home cleaning services provide thorough and reliable care for your living spaces.

header.title: Connecting You with Trusted Cleaning Services
header.description: Our mission is to simplify your life by connecting you with reliable cleaning professionals who meet your specific needs. Experience a cleaner, healthier space with just a few clicks.

OUR_TEAM.TITLE: Our Team
OUR_TEAM.SUBTITLE: Meet the professionals behind our exceptional cleaning services.
OUR_TEAM.HIRING_DESC: Join a team that values excellence and teamwork.

FAQS.TITLE: FAQs
FAQS.SUBTITLE: Find answers to your most pressing questions about our cleaning services, payments, and more.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: How do I book?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Booking a cleaning service is simple! Just select your preferred date and time, and fill out the necessary details on our website. Once submitted, you will receive a confirmation email.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: What payment methods are accepted?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. All transactions are secure and encrypted for your safety. You can choose your preferred method during the checkout process.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: How to file complaints?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: If you have any complaints, please reach out to our customer service team. You can contact us via email or phone, and we will address your concerns promptly. Your feedback is important to us!

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Can I reschedule?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Yes, you can easily reschedule your cleaning appointment. Simply log into your account and select a new date and time. Make sure to do this at least 24 hours in advance to avoid any fees.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Are services insured?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Absolutely! All our cleaning services are fully insured for your peace of mind. In the unlikely event of any damage, we will take responsibility and ensure it is resolved. Your satisfaction and security are our top priorities.

DISCOUNT.TITLE: Get 10% off your first order
DISCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Select your preferred cleaner and service to enjoy a spotless space today!
